name: IoES Logo
tagline: UCLA Institute of the Environment and Sustainability logo
body:
## Intro
We want to help make it easy to use the UCLA IoES logo by making them publicly available here on github.

## Logo formats
Weâ€™ve crafted our logo in a variety of formats for various use cases and apps. These include: 

- ai
- sketch
- pdf
- png
- sass color variables

## Other formats?
Please let us know if there is a format you need and we'll do our best to add it to this project repository.

## Support or Contact
Having trouble? Send me an email at <mailto:sgruber@ioes.ucla.edu> and I'll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
